comments.en:
Multi-function device: Printer, Scanner, Copier.

The printing engine is the one of the Epson Stylus C84, see that printer entry for more info.

Scanning should work as described for the Epson Stylus CX3200 and CX5200. Unfortunately, noone confirmed yet whether the scanning engine of this model is supported by SANE, therefore this printer is listed as "Partially" working for now.

Copying should just work with the front panel of the device.
